declarations.description: A web component that transforms heading-structured content into an accessible tabbed interface
declarations.name: TabbedInterfaceElement

members.name: activeIndex
members.description: Gets or sets the current active tab index

members.name: showHeaders
members.description: Whether to show headers in tab panels

members.name: tablistAfter
members.description: Whether tablist is positioned after content

events.name: tabbed-interface:change
events.description: Fired when the active tab changes

type.text: CustomEvent<{ tabId: string, tabpanelId: string, tabIndex: number }>

attributes.name: show-headers
attributes.description: When present, shows the heading elements within tab panels (default: false)

attributes.name: tablist-after
attributes.description: When present, positions the tab list after the content (default: false)

attributes.name: default-tab
attributes.description: Index or heading ID of the tab to show by default
